SEO.title: Industry Info, News & Tips
SEO.description: Check our blog for the latest updates and news from the world of blockchain, AI, VR, IoT, software and app development.

data.title: Blockchain and IoT Solutions for Pharmaceutical Supply Chains
data.baseline: Today, pharmaceutical supply chains fail to overcome the challenges of transparency, safety, and to fulfill the ethical requirements set up by the regulatory bodies. While proprietary IT systems are unable to overcome these challenges, Blockchain and IoT technologies are emerging as secure and efficient solutions.

data.title: The 10 Basic Myths of Blockchain
data.baseline: Blockchain today is where the internet used to be in its early stages. It is a very promising emerging technology. However, most people are still unaware of its applications and enormous potential.

data.title: Blockchain and Climate Change Applications
data.baseline: Though best known for its applications in cryptocurrency, blockchains are finding diverse applications in various fields. Blockchain climate change application can further the cause of sustainability in the coming years.

data.title: Top Ethereum DeFi Lending, DEX, and Payments Projects
data.baseline: Decentralized finance has exploded into a sector with a steady growth of assets value locked in smart contracts. New types of DeFi projects are proliferating while DeFi lending, DeFi payments, and decentralized exchanges remain as the most profitable industry segments.

data.title: How to Choose the Best Bitcoin Wallet
data.baseline: Choosing a bitcoin wallet can be challenging, especially for cryptocurrency beginners. Knowing the key usability, privacy, and security features will lead you to the right decision.

data.title: Blockchain and Its Implementation in Finance, Real Estate, and Advertising
data.baseline: Global market research and data analytics companies constantly list blockchain among top strategic technologies. Blockchain is set to have the most impact on Finance, Real Estate, and Advertising industries in 2020, as businesses identify the ever growing need for going digital and securing non-cash transactions.

data.title: Telegram Open Network (TON): Comprehensive Guide, News, Insights & Updates
data.baseline: Telegram Open Network was Pavel Durov’s attempt to tackle many pressing issues of blockchain implementation with the introduction of modern infinitely-scalable hypercube architecture. The project has been discontinued on May 12, 2020.

preview320.title: blockchain-in-healthcare-preview-600
preview320.alt: A scientist in a lab searching for a vaccine

data.title: The Amazing Applications of Blockchain in Healthcare
data.baseline: As our world slowly distances from the pandemic and we regain a sense of "normality", implementing blockchain can improve our healthcare system, making it faster, secure, cheaper, and more trustworthy. That way we will be better prepared in the future if another pandemic occurs.
